ygData.subject: Good day to all.
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings to all.  I thought that I should take a moment to introduce myself to ye all.  I am Lexcanium, a Human Paladin who has currently attained the tenth
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings to all. I thought that I should take a moment to introduce
myself to ye all. I am Lexcanium, a Human Paladin who has currently attained
the tenth numerical rank within his training. I can be found, generally, all
throughout Norrath, as I wander the land often, making my way from one place
to the next. Most often, as of late, I can be found on the beautiful
continent of Faydwer slaying the evil Orcs of the Clan Crushbone, which, by
the way, seem to hold a vendetta against me... At least that is the
impression I infer when they scream things such as, "Your actions and history
are a personal affront to all I stand for!" when trying in vain to beat me to
a bloody pulp.
If our paths shall ever cross, feel free to stop and talk for a
while, I am usually always free for some friendly chatter. Fare thee well,
and may we purge the wonderful lands of Norrath from all evil in given time!

Safe travels,
Lexcanium MacCrege
Holy Knight of Erollisi Marr
